name: Twitter International Company
legal: Company Incorporated in the Republic of Ireland
membership: Twitter is a member of the ICT Coalition and the Family Online Safety Institute (FOSI) and EDiMA.
goal: Twitter's mission is to give everyone the power to create and share ideas and information instantly, without barriers.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: Online Safety and following the initiatives of the Digital Single Market.
